relations.target: lurk: lie in wait, lie in ambush, behave in a sneaky and secretive manner <i34870>
monitor: keep tabs on; keep an eye on; keep under surveillance; 'we are monitoring the air quality'; 'the police monitor the suspect's moves' <i32568>
